header.title: Vampiric Personal Magnetism: A chapter from a manuscript in preparation called, the 'Vampiric Psychic Ability'
header.category: Western Esotericism, Occultism, Vampiric Spirituality, Psychic Development

central_thesis: The text presents a practical, year-long system of exercises designed to cultivate 'Vampiric Personal Magnetism' and 'Vampiric Will-Power', asserting these abilities are inherent to 'vampires' and can be developed through consistent, disciplined, and 'self-determined' practice aligned with an 'Abyssal Impersonal Self' and the 'Universal Abyssal Will', leading to enhanced influence, self-confidence, and success within a specific 'Aristocrat Vampiric Community' context.

structure_content.summary: Defines Will-Power as the 'force' of Re-action and determinative faculty. It's free when 'self-determined' from 'Within in the Dark Light of the Abyssal Reason', becoming sovereign on the dark/sinister plane. True Vampiric Will-Power is aristocratic, aligning with the Vampiric Higher Self (Soul), other Vampires, and the Universal Abyssal Will (will-to-fight, cosmic Order, Dark deities).

Explains personal magnetism as an inherent 'diffused power' within atoms, which can be collectively drawn into nerve centers and the brain. When combined with 'brain-power', it manifests as 'soul' or 'feeling', enabling influence over others. This power allows desires to manifest effortlessly due to one's magnetic impulse.

structure_content.chapter_title: Reading about Personal Magnetism is not enough
structure_content.summary: Stresses that magnetic growth is a slow process requiring diligent, consistent, and intelligent effort, not mere intellectual understanding. It emphasizes that 'Success-Magnetism' is a practical power for real-life application, built through deep absorption by the 'subjective self'.
Briefly states that personal charisma and magnetism stem from an attracting energy flowing through body and mind, implying further, unstated dimensions to these qualities.

Offers practical advice for enhancing personal influence: act friendly, use positive body language (e.g., eye contact, uncrossed arms/legs), maintain a balanced positive attitude, good posture, and judiciously help others, while also knowing when to decline tasks.

Outlines the core objectives of the self-program: increasing popularity among vampires and others, attracting beneficial people/circumstances (for 'better feeding'), self-protection from energy drain, and boosting self-confidence.

Describes personal magnetism as a subtle, dynamic force for influencing others. Provides general guidance for the 16 core exercises: daily practice (15-30 minutes, can be split), slow pace, consistency even when unwell, avoiding practice during menstruation for women, and expected results over months.

structure_content.chapter_title: Learning Personal Magnetism in One Year
structure_content.summary: Reiterates the program's year-long commitment with visible results at three, six, and twelve months. Introduces the fundamental technique of 'making magnetic passes' over symbolic drawings: slow downward movement, slight hand closure, and faster upward return.
Instructions for specific exercises (panel 4, 12, 16) involving comfortable sitting, placing the manuscript at a 45-degree angle, and fixing attention on the exercise's subject.
Instructions for exercise panel 8, similar to sight exercises, involving standing and repeating a formula while firmly looking at the center of the drawing (reversed pentagram).

Describes a breathing exercise for 'magnetic breathing' and voice amplification: pronouncing 'VH' softly to hard while exhaling, then inhaling slowly and deeply through the nose. This develops a powerful voice for defense.

Details the standardized structure for each exercise description: nature, value, practice instructions, duration (min/max), mental orientation, and common mistakes to avoid (e.g., 'better' often being 'the enemy of the good').

Provides detailed, step-by-step instructions for 16 core exercises. These include 'Magnetisation' over various symbolic drawings (magnet, solar disk, human figure, diamond, woman, cubic stone, magnetic water, radiations, cat, tree, spine), 'Gazing Culture' (on discs), 'Autosuggestion' (on a reversed pentagram), and 'Projection of Breath' (insufflations). Each exercise specifies duration, posture, hand movements (where applicable), and 'Mental Orientation' (the intended mental focus/outcome).

Introduces additional preliminary exercises focused on deeper concentration, body control, and self-mastery. These include sitting still for extended periods, cultivating a self-poised demeanor, holding a glass of water steadily, arm extension and gaze fixation, finger manipulation, thumb twirling, full moon concentration, star counting, stone manipulation, distant thought projection, sand drawing, and structured autosuggestions for Will-Power and memory development.

A personal statement from Hagur, emphasizing his non-commercial, individual opinions, aristocratic 'vampire' identity, and preference for intelligent communication. He warns readers that his content may be offensive and states he is not responsible for children, as he identifies with a Left Hand Path ethos of self-love, specific respect, and relentless self-expression.

key_concepts.definition: The 'force' of Re-action and the determinative faculty. It is initially influenced by judgment, desire, attractions, and repulsions. It becomes 'free' and 'sovereign' when it externalizes from 'Within in the Dark Light of the Abyssal Reason', becoming self-determined rather than a slave to material impulses.

An aristocratic form of Will-Power that aligns with three main relationships: the practitioner's own Vampiric Higher Self (Soul), the will of other Vampires within a community, and the Universal Abyssal Will (representing the will-to-fight, cosmic Order, Dark deities, and 'Life' as a whole).

The 'key and doorway to our vampiric and magickal talents', responsible for processing energy and information beyond linear perception. It facilitates intuition and is equated with the 'lower self' (unconscious/subconscious) as described by psychologists like Jung and Assagioli, leading to cosmic awareness and insight.

An inherent 'diffused power' present in the countless atoms of the body. This magnetism is collected into nerve centers and the brain. When this collective fund is united with 'brain-power', it generates personal magnetism, manifesting as 'soul' or 'feeling' that influences others.

A foundational physical technique involving specific hand movements over symbolic drawings. Hands are held three centimeters apart, fingers together, forming a tip one centimeter above the drawing. A slow, dragging movement from top to bottom is performed, followed by a slight hand closure and a quicker return to the top, then repeated.

A practice involving the mechanical repetition of a specific formula or verse (e.g., 'Everyday, as Vampire in every matter, I feel myself better and better') while calmly viewing the center of a symbolic drawing, specifically a reversed pentagram, to draw external forces and enhance personal potency.

A breathing exercise where one stands with hands on hips, forming lips to pronounce 'OU', then exhales slowly and deeply while making a 'VH' sound (without a sound vowel, yet producing a deep noise through air column vibration). This develops magnetic breath, strengthens the voice, and serves as a defense mechanism.

practical_system.description: The system is a structured, year-long daily regimen for developing 'Vampiric Personal Magnetism' and 'Vampiric Will-Power'. It consists of 16 core exercises and additional 'useful exercises', emphasizing consistency over intensity. Key techniques include 'magnetisation' (slow hand passes over symbolic drawings to infuse them with personal fluid/magnetism), 'gazing culture' (calm fixation on symbols for sympathy/fascination), 'autosuggestion' (repeating affirmations while focusing on a reversed pentagram for self-transformation), and 'projection of breath' (specific vocalizations for magnetic breath and voice power). Each exercise includes detailed instructions, specific durations (1-5 minutes), and 'Mental Orientation' to guide the practitioner's internal focus and intent. The overall aim is to absorb external forces, strengthen self, and project influence unconsciously to achieve goals and inspire others.
tools: The physical manuscript/e-book (as it contains the symbolic drawings for exercises)
Practitioner's own hands (for magnetic passes and physical control exercises)
Practitioner's own eyes (for gazing culture and concentration exercises)
Practitioner's own breath and voice (for insufflations)
A flat surface (table or desk) to place the manuscript
A wine glass filled with water (for arm steadiness exercise)
Moistened sand (for drawing characters and thought-form transmission)
A darkened chamber (for focused concentration after Full Moon)
rituals: Magnetisation: Performing slow, dragging hand passes over specific symbolic drawings (e.g., magnet, solar disk, human figure, diamond, cubic stone, magnetic water bottle, tree, cat, spine) from top to bottom, with specific mental orientations for each symbol (e.g., universal magnetism, radiating earthly magnetism, influencing crowds, attracting desires, accumulating forces).

Gazing Culture: Calmly fixing gaze upon symbolic discs (e.g., small empty disc for sympathy/trust, black disc for fascination) with a soft, smiling, and relaxed expression, without blinking or flickering, aiming for powerful influence through sight.

Autosuggestion: Sitting or standing while calmly viewing the center of a reversed pentagram (symbolizing balance, harmony, and the 'highest human ideal' within the vampiric context) and mechanically repeating a specific verse (e.g., 'Everyday, as Vampire in every matter, I feel myself better and better') to draw external forces and enhance vampiric potential.

Projection of Breath (Insufflations): Standing with hands on hips, lips positioned to pronounce 'OU', and exhaling slowly and deeply while making a 'VH' sound (a deep, amplified noise from the air column's vibration), followed by silent, deep nasal inhalation. This develops 'magnetic breath' and a powerful voice.
Stillness & Self-Control: Sitting motionless for extended periods (5-15 minutes), avoiding involuntary muscular movements and internal disturbances, to gain dominion over the body and mind.

Focus & Concentration: Exercises involving sustained mental focus on objects (e.g., wine glass, hand, stones, distant stars) or abstract thoughts (one thing only after Full Moon, distant individuals) to strengthen will-power, memory, and thought projection.

Demeanor Cultivation: Consciously adopting a self-poised, dignified, courteous, and quiet demeanor, avoiding fidgeting, nervous habits, and excessive emotional displays, to embody 'Firmness', 'Self-Control', and 'Self-Respect'.

relevant_quotes.text: Will-Power is the 'force' of Re-action. It can render all the other mental functions active or passive. It is the determinative faculty and is affected most of all by the judgment.

But when it draws the volition for externalising itself from 'Within in the Dark Light of the Abyssal Reason', then indeed is it Will-Power. On the material the human will is a slave; on the dark or sinister plane it is the sovereign.

The true Vampiric Will-Power is aristocratic as it meets the requirements of appropriate relationship with: (1) The will of its own Vampiric Higher Self, known as the Soul. (2) The will of other Vampires, such as should be found in Vampiric brotherhood or work group, against the neighbouring communities around and Christianised society in general, as well as influences of other religions. (3) The Universal Abyssal Will (Collective Vampiric Will) that is, the will-to-fight (man is a warrior), the evil of the whole (no one is good), the laws of cosmic (evil) Order, the Purpose of the Dark deities (Energies), and 'Life' as a whole.
The psychic mind is both the key and doorway to our vampiric and magickal talents.
When the collective fund known as brain-power is united with the increased fund of magnetism, the result is personal magnetism.
Everyday, as Vampire in every matter, I feel myself better and better
“This is to develop my Will-Power, and no temporary pain can equal the power and satisfaction arising out of self-control.”

critical_analysis.relevance: This text is highly relevant to contemporary Left Hand Path (LHP) esotericism, specifically within modern vampiric and Draconian currents. It provides a structured, practical approach to personal power development, rooted in a distinctly non-Abrahamic, 'sinister' philosophy. The emphasis on 'self-determined' Will-Power, drawing from the 'Dark Light of the Abyssal Reason', and aligning with a 'Universal Abyssal Will' firmly places it within LHP traditions valuing self-apotheosis and mastery. Its practical system for 'psychic ability' and 'personal magnetism' directly addresses common aspirations in occultism for influence, self-protection, and spiritual evolution, presenting a coherent system for those seeking a 'vampiric' identity beyond mere fantasy.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience is individuals engaged in or exploring Left Hand Path esotericism, vampiric spirituality, and advanced self-mastery through occult practices. This includes members of 'Aristocrat Vampiric Community' or similar esoteric fraternities, those seeking practical methods for psychic development, and individuals committed to cultivating a powerful, influencing presence. The author explicitly dismisses 'empty-brained men' seeking praise, indicating a serious, disciplined, and discreet practitioner audience. It caters to those who resonate with concepts of aristocratic power, self-sovereignty, and a 'sinister' worldview.
